traits.name: Bravery
entries: The cavalier has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

traits.name: Light's Fury
entries: The cavalier deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage when it hits with a weapon attack.

traits.name: Skilled Rider
entries: While mounted, the cavalier may force an attack targeted at their mount to target them instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The cavalier makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Lance
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cavalier is an 8th-level spellcaster that uses Charisma as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}; {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). They have the following paladin spells prepared:
